Name: 1. Nina Hotel Tsuen Wan West
Address: 8 Yeung Uk Road Tsuen Wan, Hong Kong China
Description:
Nina Hotel Tsuen Wan West is a genuine Hong Kong landmark that presides over the Kowloon Peninsula’s Western edge. Standing between Tai Mo Shan mountain and the Rambler Channel, it was originally planned to be the world’s tallest building. However, its proximity to the airport flightpath led to it becoming the two sparkling sister towers of today. This Nina’s location is packed with appeals. Firstly, getting here is easy. It’s less than 20 minutes by road from Central, Tsim Sha Tsui is a 12 minute train ride, and the international airport is 25 minutes by the highway. So you see, it’s an efficient base from which to explore. But be warned, you may not want to leave.

Name: 2. Royal Plaza Hotel
Address: 193 Prince Edward Road West, Kowloon, Hong Kong China
Description:
Located in Mong Kok, the bustling heart of vibrant Kowloon, Royal Plaza Hotel sits atop the MTR Mong Kok East Station with connecting point to China on a 45-minute train ride and is easy access to public transportation. The Hotel is connected to a seven storey shopping complex and numerous traditional markets with its abundance of stalls ans shops for fashion and electronic appliances are within a 10-minute walk from the hotel's doorstep. Awarded as "Travel Choice - Family Hotel 2014" by Tripadvisor, the newly renovated rooms with a choice of two queen-sized beds in a superior space, which is designed to more than comfortably accommodate families and groups comprised of 4 guests. The hotel features free Wi-Fi in all guestrooms, a 40-metre swimming pool, a well-equipped gymnasium and three restaurants and bar.

Name: 3. Page148
Address: 148 Austin Road, Tsim Sha Tsui, Kowloon, Hong Kong China
Description:
If what you're looking for is a conveniently located property in Hong Kong, look no further than Page148. Situated at Tsim Sha Tsui, guests are well located to enjoy the town's attractions and activities. All rooms provide a refreshing greenery view facing Kowloon Cricket Club. Free Wi-Fi, 24-hour security, flat screen TV, and an air-purifier available at all rooms. The uncluttered bathrooms feature Australian brand bathroom amenities, hair dryers and large mirrors to get ready for a day of adventure. 8min walk to both Tsim Sha Tsui and Jordan MTR stations, and just 10 min ride from the Express Rail Link Hong Kong West Kowloon Station. Page Common, a renowned coffee house located on G/F where you can get specialty coffee and pastries. Express check-out available. 「都會旅人‧共享見聞」於尖沙咀Page148晉緻酒店體驗不一樣的型格舒適享受。進入酒店便被咖啡香包圍, 展開寫意旅程; 都市時尚型格設計，所有房間皆配置落地大玻璃窗，整片草綠景緻進入眼簾。每間客房均配備43吋等離子平面電視機、舒適寢具及智能空氣凈化器。每間浴室設計時尚舒適，提供澳洲品牌APPELLES浴室個人用品，並配備吹髮器及敞大玻璃鏡，讓客人每天清新悅目地開啟精彩的一天。酒店位置四通八達，步行至尖沙咀及佐敦地鐵站只需數分鐘，無論是大型國際商場或是香港特色小店，盡在咫尺。離接駁機場快線的九龍站或廣深港高速鐵路的香港西九龍站只需10分鐘車程。

Name: 5. Hotel ICON
Address: No.17 Science Museum Road, Tsim Sha Tsui East, Kowloon, Hong Kong China
Description: A hotel unlike any other. Welcome to a different world. Hotel ICON is a unique hotel designed by celebrated architects Terence Conran, Rocco Yim and William Lim. Breathtaking open public spaces, a striking vertical garden by Patrick Blanc, a grand sweeping staircase, innovative guest rooms and three vibrant dining spaces radiate contemporary style. We offer our guests traditional Asian hospitality, with all its courteous and attentive qualities – but in a refreshingly modern, stylish and international environment.

Name: 6. Alva Hotel by Royal
Address: No.1 Yuen Hong Street, Shatin, Hong Kong China
Description: ALVA HOTEL BY ROYAL is a new premium hotel with 618 rooms. It is highly accessible and within a 30 to 40-minute drive of Tsim Sha Tsui, Central and Hong Kong International Airport. The hotel offers guest-centric technology, innovative dining and accessible luxury with a modern lifestyle hospitality concept designed specifically for city-explorers.

Name: 7. Dorsett Mongkok Hong Kong
Address: No. 88 Tai Kok Tsui Road Kowloon, Hong Kong China
Description:
Best known for its service excellence and is conveniently located amid Tai Kok Tsui and Mongkok, with a mere 7-min walk away from the Olympic metro (MTR) station, Dorsett Mongkok is a proud recipient of TripAdvisor's Travellers' Choice' award for 11 years and one of the few EarthCheck's silver-certified green hotels in Hong Kong. Hotel facilities include smart bottle-filling water stations on selected guest floors, 24-hour fitness studio and self-service laundry, and Dorsett Kitchen serving light breakfast daily. Enjoy our Foodpanda room service menu available until late hours, and vending machine fully-stocked with refreshments and daily necessities.

Name: 8. Cordis, Hong Kong
Address: 555 Shanghai Street, Mongkok, Kowloon, Hong Kong China
Description:
Cordis, Hong Kong is an upscale 5-star hotel located in the vibrant Mongkok district of Kowloon. This 665 room modern hotel is directly linked to the Langham Place shopping mall and Mongkok MTR station. All rooms and suites are equipped with high speed wifi, LED TVs. Our wellness facilities include a fully equipped fitness center, two fitness studios and outdoor heated pool, along with the Chuan Spa, which features over 60 unique treatments. Dining options include the Michelin starred contemporary Cantonese restaurant, Ming Court, the trendy European restaurant and bar, Alibi – Wine Dine Be Social, and The Garage Bar, the new outdoor food truck destination bar, as well as The Place, the hotel’s all day dining restaurant. The hotel also features some of Hong Kong’s best meeting and event facilities including Kowloon’s highest ballroom, The Star Room, and the 600 seater Ballroom, which includes a 7m x 4m built in LED wall.

Name: 9. Regal Airport Hotel
Address: No.9 Cheong Tat Road, Chek Lap Kok, Hong Kong International Airport, Hong Kong China
Description:
Regal Airport Hotel Hong Kong has been recognized as the World's Best Airport Hotel by Business Traveller UK Magazine. Directly connected to the passenger terminal of Hong Kong International Airport and only a two-minute walk away, the Hotel is also in close proximity to the AsiaWorld-Expo convention centre. All 1,171 smoke-free guest rooms and suites have contemporary design and comfort is ensured by the double-glazed soundproof windows and comprehensive in-room amenities. Regal Airport Hotel Hong Kong also features world-class meeting facilities with 30 function rooms and one of the largest pillar-free grand ballrooms in a hotel equipped with a 9-meter width and 4-meter height HD LED wall. Additionally, the Hotel features a variety of authentic cuisine at its six restaurants and bars, and it has a complete range of recreational facilities including the award-winning OM Spa, state-of-the-art gym, an outdoor pool and an indoor heated swimming pool.

Name: 11. Harbour Grand Hong Kong
Address: No.23 Oil Street, North Point MTR Fortress Hill Station, Exit A, Hong Kong China
Description:
The multi-award winning Harbour Grand Hong Kong is ideally located in the heart of Hong Kong Island and just few minutes walk from the MTR station with easy access to the city's business, shopping, dining and fashion districts. All 828 contemporary-designed guestrooms and suites featuring different perspectives of Victoria Harbour. In addition to the 27-metre outdoor swimming pool, gymnasium, spa facilities, a total of 12,685 square feet of meeting spaces, there are also 5 distinguished restaurants which accent Cantonese, European, Japanese and international cuisines, with Le 188 Restaurant and Lounge boasting a 188 degree panoramic harbour view.

Name: 12. The Luxe Manor
Address: 39 Kimberley Road, Tsim Sha Tsui, Kowloon, Hong Kong China
Description:
The Luxe Manor is a stylishly surrealism-inspired boutique hotel located in Hong Kong's Tsim Sha Tsui with colourful and splendid European architecture offering personalised service and excellent facilities to impress discerning leisure and business travellers. Nestled in the heart of commercial and entertainment district, guests can truly appreciate the convenient access to all corners of the metropolitan. The Luxe Manor boasts 153 stylish, yet quirky, guest rooms, 6 one-of-its-kind themed suites taking the guests into unimaginable pleasures. Located within the luxury boutique hotels are two unconventional restaurants and bars: FINDS, the first authentic Nordic restaurant in Hong Kong featuring Nordic cuisine, and Dada Bar + Lounge, a Dadaism-inspired lounge with various entertainments and live music performances on weekends.

Name: 13. The Salisbury - YMCA of Hong Kong
Hotel_name: The Salisbury - YMCA of Hong Kong
Address: 41 Salisbury Road, Tsimshatsui, Kowloon, Hong Kong China
Description:
All 372 rooms and suites feature a modern and functional design. Complimentary free broadband WIFI access is available in all rooms. The Salisbury is a smoke free property and all rooms are non-smoking. Facilities include The Haven, The Mall Cafe, Banquet Rooms, Podium Garden, Fitness Centre with well-equipped Gymnasium, Indoor Swimming Pools, Jacuzzi, Y Shop, Climbing Walls, Squash Courts and Basket Ball Court. "A Symphony of Lights" was awarded the world's "Largest Permanent Light and Sound Show" by Guinness World Records. This nightly spectacle combines interactive lights of more than 47 buildings on both Hong Kong Island and Kowloon with musical effects to showcase the vibrancy and glamorous night vista of Victoria Harbour. Our hotel guests could enjoy the spectacular show from our Harbour View Rooms and Harbour View Suites nightly.

With easy access to Hong Kong-Zhuhal-Macao Bridge and Tuen Mun-Chek Lap Kok Link, the hotel provides unrivalled connectivity to the Greater Bay Area and Macau via land, and to the rest of the world via air. Address: No.88 Yee Wo Street, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong China
Description:
Regal Hongkong Hotel features 481 guestrooms, including 48 guestrooms and suites on the Executive Club Floor. The Executive Club Floor offers a private lounge, breakfast, all day refreshment and evening cocktail. The Hotel also features 20 function rooms, a spectacular rooftop swimming pool with panoramic views of park and harbour, a well-equipped gymnasium. The Hotel was named a Top 10 City-Nova Hotels of China at the 10th China Hotel Starlight Awards. Situated in Causeway Bay, one of the most dynamic districts in Hong Kong, Regal Hongkong Hotel is near Times Square, Sogo, Hong Kong Convention and Exhibition Centre. Name: 18. The Cityview
Address: No.23 Waterloo Road, Kowloon, Hong Kong China
Description:
Boasting a prestigious address in the heart of Yau Ma Tei - filled with unique cultural and urban charm - The Cityview sits adjacent to the bustling Nathan Road, the famous shopping and entertainment district renowned for its historical buildings and famous attractions like the Temple Street Night Market, Yau Ma Tei Wholesale Fruit Market, Ladies’ Market and Chinese Opera Theatre. The Cityview achieves world-class green eco-standards and provides the finest in healthy accommodation by means of initiatives such as dedicated live plant walls in the lobby, plus in-room environmentally friendly facilities as well as a smoke-free overall environment. Boasting Platinum Certificate status from the globally respected Environmental Management Programme - EarthCheck, we are the prestige property at the forefront of eco-conscious hospitality in Hong Kong. We also provide up-to-date amenities and facilities including complimentary Wi-Fi, as well as professional and attentive services to make you feel right at home during your stay.

Address: 61 - 65 Chatham Road South, Tsim Sha Tsui, Kowloon Tsimshatsui, Hong Kong China
Description: Feel the pulse of the city from the Park Hotel Hong Kong, strategically located in the heart of Kowloon's entertainment and business district of Tsim Sha Tsui. At the forefront of Tsim Sha Tsui's buzzing nightlife, you will be spoiled for choice with an extensive array of eateries and dining establishments. The Star Ferry, Tsim Sha Tsui and East Tsim Sha Tsui MTR Station are a five to ten minutes' walk away, giving you easy access to the rest of this vibrant city. Complimentary WiFi access. Book directly at our hotel website and enjoy exclusive perks. The health and safety of our guests and team members are of utmost priority at Park Hotel Hong Kong.

Name: 20. Ramada Hong Kong Grand
Address: 23 Austin Avenue, Tsimshatsui, Kowloon, Hong Kong China
Description:
Looking for a place to stay in Hong Kong? Then look no further than Ramada Hong Kong Grand, a quiet hotel that brings the best of Hong Kong to your doorstep. 396 Rooms at Ramada Hong Kong Grand provide a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a minibar, and guests can stay connected with free wifi. In addition, while staying at Ramada Hong Kong Grand guests have access to a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and baggage storage. You can also enjoy a fitness centre and an on-site restaurant. Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Sandbox VR (0.3 mi) and Tsim Sha Tsui Promenade (0.6 mi), guests of Ramada Hong Kong Grand can easily experience some of Hong Kong's most well known attractions. While visiting Hong Kong, you may want to try some shrimp at one of the nearby restaurants, such as Tim Ho Wan, the Dim-Sum Specialists, One Dim Sum Chinese Restaurant, or Mott 32. Best of all, Ramada Hong Kong Grand makes it easy to experience many great Hong Kong attractions like Chi Lin Nunnery, International Commerce Centre, and IFC mall, which are some popular architectural buildings. We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Ramada Hong Kong Grand as you experience everything Hong Kong has to offer.

Name: 21. Disney's Hollywood Hotel
Address: Disneyland, Lantau Island, Hong Kong China
Description: Surround yourself in the glitz and grandeur of classic Hollywood at this richly appointed hotel. “Take 5” in the piano-shaped pool or stroll through a lush garden courtyard of vintage cars and famous landmarks. Combining stunning Art-Deco architecture with a dash of Disney magic, Disney’s Hollywood Hotel invites you to stay in a place where you’re the star.

Description:

If you’re feeling peckish, there’s no need to venture out. Simply grab a sandwich, tea, coffee or a light meal at Ease Deli i

Name: 23. Ramada Hong Kong Harbour View
Address: 239 Queen's Road West MTR Sai Ying Pun Station Exit A1, Hong Kong China
Description: The Ramada Hong Kong Harbour View is a 38-story high-rise located on Queen's Road West on Hong Kong Island. 432 Guest rooms with most of the rooms facing the famous Victoria Harbour. Rooms adopt a modern chic design with dining facilities and a seasonal roof-top swimming pool. All rooms are equipped with free WIFI, flat TV, cable TV program, in-room safe, mini refrigerator, replenishment of coffee & tea set, IDD phone and central air conditioning. Hotel is steps away from MTR Sai Ying Pun Station (Exit A1). Tram stop is nearby which makes the connection with the Central and the East more close.

Name: 26. Harbour Plaza 8 Degrees
Address: No.199 Kowloon City Road Kowloon, Hong Kong China
Description:

The award winning Harbour Plaza 8 Degrees has a unique twist to its lobby, designed with utmost innovation creating an optical illusion where it feels as if you're inside Italy's Leaning Tower of Pisa. Features 704 guestrooms and suites, boasting a 32-inch LCD TV, in-room Wi-Fi access, mini-bar, tea & coffee-making facilities. Two restaurants offer International, Asian, Halal and Indian cuisines, one inviting bar, a full service Business Centre, a well-equipped Fitness Centre, a relaxing sauna and a distinctively shaped outdoor swimming pool, children's pool and whirlpool surrounded by a lush landscape. Offering hospitable service and excellent facilities, Harbour Plaza 8 Degrees distinguishes itself admirably among travelers appealing to business, leisure, family vacation or romantic getaway looking for comfortable and pleasurable accommodation at great value. **According to the guidelines from Centre for Health Protection, sauna will be closed until further notice. We apologise for any inconvenience caused.

Address: No.28 Kimberly Road, Tsim Sha Tsui, Kowloon, Hong Kong China
Description: The Kimberley Hotel is centrally located in the bustling shopping and entertainment district of Tsim Sha Tsui in Kowloon with 45 minutes drive from the airport and 15 minutes from the Hung Hom Train Station & Kowloon Station. The MTR station, Star Ferry, Avenue of Star, Hong Kong Space Museum, Cultural Center and major corporate offices are within walking distance. At the Kimberley Hotel, the three elegant restaurants and Bar are on offer to guest, as well as a business center, gym and health spa for your recreation.

Name: 30. Hotel COZi Resort Tuen Mun
Address: No.4 Kin Fung Circuit, Tuen Mun, Hong Kong China
Description:
The Hotel COZi‧Resort is Hong Kong’s first vacation themed resort hotel. Opened in 2019, the hotel has 430 themed rooms, and a classic railway-themed entrance, with train station features in the lobby. The resort is designed to help guests to escape the hustle and bustle of the city and embark on a delightful journey of engaging discovery. Located beside the MTR Tuen Mun Station, Hotel COZi‧Resort is just steps away from tmtplaza - the largest shopping mall in the Northwest New Territories - which offers guests the chance to enjoy a myriad of shopping, dining and entertainment experiences. Our unique rooms and suites are decorated in four captivating themes: Africa; Japan; Thailand and Greece, plus delightful Penguin Rooms. In addition to an outdoor swimming pool and meeting facilities, the hotel also offers a fun 2,500 sq. ft. children playroom where kids can play safely. Guests can stay fit more vigorously at the gym or simply relax at our spa. And after all that exercise, there’s nowhere better to recharge than at our restaurant, The Platter.

Address: No.62 Kimberly Road, Tsim Sha Tsui, Kowloon, Hong Kong China
Description: Empire Hotel Kowloon is situated in a central urban area of Kowloon where visitors will find shops galore, all the convenience and excitement of a vibrant city. The hotel is accessible from all parts of Hong Kong via a seamless transportation hub by rail, land and sea and it is also within walking distance of the China-Macau Ferry Terminal, the gateway to China and the Pearl River Delta.

Name: 273. Jockey Club Mt. Davis Youth Hostel
Hotel_name: Jockey Club Mt. Davis Youth Hostel
Address: No.123 Mount Davis Path, Bofulin, Hong Kong China
Description:
The Jockey Club Mt. Davis Youth Hostel, situated against the backdrop of Mount Davis in Pokfulam, offers you the best of both worlds enabling you to enjoy both breathtaking views across Victoria Harbour whilst also being only a short distance from the many clubs, bars, and restaurants for which Hong Kong is justly famous. You can soak up unforgettable morning views of the multitude of boats in the shipping lanes and the distant Tsing Ma Bridge before heading to the heart of Hong Kong by our free shuttle bus to Sheung Wan in 20 minutes for shopping and sightseeing. You can also opt for an historic walk following our heritage trail leaflet to visit a series of World War Two military relics, including the command headquarters, arsenal and batteries of the British military forces at Mount Davis and in the nearby Lung Fu Shan Country Park.

Address: 8 Main St, Yung shue Wan, Lamma Island, Hong Kong China
Description:

Guest rooms offer amenities such as air conditioning, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the bed and breakfast.

Name: 275. City Oasis Guest House
Address: Ngau Au Village Tung Chung Lantau Island, Hong Kong China
Ranking: #10 of 132 guest houses in Hong Kong
Description:
We are "City Oasis Guest House" , which is a licensed guesthouse (holiday flat) in Hong Kong. Our license number is H5714. Our house is located at a small village in the outskirts of Tung Chung, 8 minutes from the Hong Kong Airport by taxi and 4 minutes from Tung Chung City by taxi. Our village is situated at the mountain foot and Tung Chung river mouth on Lantau Island, the green fort of Hong Kong. Our property is a three-storey village house with a total of 2800 square feet. At the rooftop and balconies, you can oversee the unique scenery view with the combination of the airport, cable-car, Tung Chung Bay, wetland, Tung Chung City and mountain views. The master room, dining room and kitchen are on the ground floor while the guest rooms are on the first and second floors. Room are clean, tidy, comfortable and homey. Our guests can feel at home as if they were members of the family, but enjoy a high degree of privacy in the rooms upstairs. Surrounded by woodlands, orchards and rivers, wildlife flies. Our place provide you a valuable opportunity to explore the beauty of the nature of Hong Kong and escape from the madness of city life. Within walking distance, many tourists spots (Tung Chung fort, Tung Chung Battery, Hau Wong Temple, Tin Hau Temple, Fu Tei Wan Lime Kiln, Lo Hon Temple, Ma Wan Chung Village...) though not very well-known, can be reached without long and boring rides. Being not well-known could be an advantage: Man Wan Chung is an ancient fishing village like Tai O. But unlike Tai O, it is quiet and not crowded by tourists, you can find the real life of the local people and enjoy the trip peacefully. If you are a nature lover, don't miss the famous hiking trials (from Tung Chung to Tai O / The big Buddha / Mui Wo) nearby. You can have all scenic views you want. Tired of busy life and tight travelling schedule, our place is the only option for you to have a leisurely and relaxing holiday. Free wifi, board games, books, roof terrace upstairs, garden, outdoor coffee tables and chairs, beach chairs, living room and dining room on the ground floor. Rentable bicycles, BBQ stove and clam digging tools.

Description:

Whether you're visiting Hong Kong for business or pleasure, Courtyard by Marriott Hong Kong helps you move forward.

Description:
One96 This exceptional luxury boutique hotel comprises full-floor, one-bedroom suites with spacious interiors and a design tailored towards comfort and elegance. Description:
Treasured for its surrounding beaches, azure blue water and a picturesque yacht paradise, The Pier Hotel is a little slice of paradise in “the back garden of Hong Kong”, Sai Kung. Escape to a private haven at The Pier Hotel where the pace of life is slow and the scenery is simply breathtaking. Nestled amidst on a tranquil pier away from the hustle and bustle, The Pier Hotel is located in Pak Sha Wan, where you may explore the local secret beaches, charming fishing villages, and experience gastronomic tour at various pubs and seafood restaurants. Urban chic balances with modest luxury in our 40 state-of-the-art guestrooms and suites offering roomy terraces, living and dining areas with fully equipped kitchen. Every moment is elevated whether you’re celebrating a special occasion or looking to relax and reconnect, The Pier Hotel is your perfect intimate escape.

Name: 361. Sleeep
Address: 1/F, 242 Queen's Road Central, Sheung Wan, Hong Kong 00000 China
Ranking: #2 of 132 guest houses in Hong Kong
Description:
Nestled in the heart of Sheung Wan, SLEEEP is a short 10 minute walk from Hong Kong's central MTR Station and a stones throw from PMQ shopping mall, making it the perfect location for a creative recharge. This award winning capsule hotel has embraced minimalism wholeheartedly throughout its design, with an exceptional user experience that has been delicately crafted with the inclusion of keyless access, essential oil diffusion and under-floor bathroom heating. Each patented SLPer capsule is equipped with multiple USB and plug sockets, adjustable magnetic felt blackout, responsive lighting, not forgetting organic cotton linen, vegan eco-down and memory foam pillows, and custom mattress and duvet. Water saving toilets, a heat recovery system and locally sourced natural soaps all highlight one of SLEEEP's core values: eco-conscious, functional design (the organic cotton towels aren't half bad either). A personal experience from check-in to check-out, everything has been considered.

Name: 372. Lanson Place Causeway Bay, Hong Kong
Hotel_name: Lanson Place Causeway Bay, Hong Kong
Address: No.133 Leighton Road, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong China
Description:
Lanson Place Causeway Bay, Hong Kong is now closed for a significant renovation that is expected to complete in the last quarter of 2023. We will undergo an extensive refurbishment of all guest rooms and public areas. Designed by award-winning French interior designer Pierre–Yves Rochon, known as the “Luxury Properties Master”, the refreshed Lanson Place Causeway Bay will deliver a French-inspired style that is timeless, distinguished and chic. The elegant and sophisticated interiors, combined with a warm and intimate ambiance, revitalise its unique location in Causeway Bay. Sustainable travel is front of mind for many of today’s travellers. Lanson Place is placing additional focus on reducing its carbon footprint while addressing the escalating demand for luxurious, yet eco-friendly accommodation for both short and long-term stays. We are very excited about the extensive transformation of Lanson Place Causeway Bay and we look forward to welcoming you back very soon.

Name: 471. Ascension House
Address: 33 Tao Fong Shan Road, Shatin, New Territories, Hong Kong Shatin China
Description:
Dear travelers, WELCOME to Ascension House! If you are looking for a place to have a personal retreat, or just a place to rest while you explore Hong Kong, Ascension House is an ideal choice. Located in the Tao Fong Shan Christian Centre, Ascension House provides a simple yet beautiful environment which rests the soul. Built in the 1930's, in the style of a Chinese Buddhist monastery, for dialogue between Christians and Buddhists, Tao Fong Shan offers a tranquil space which is virtually unmatched in Hong Kong. Visitors may also attend the morning, midday and evening prayers of the Centre, which are a central part of the communal lifestyle here.Ascension House began to host backpackers in 1986. Traveling requires an adventurous spirit leaving one's comfort zone, and entering an unfamiliar place. It is not only a journey of the body, but also the soul and spirit. Ascension House is a place where travelers from different countries, and with different beliefs and philosophies, gather for rest, renewal and friendship. Tao Fong Shan (including Ascension House) is a non-profit organization.The managers of Ascension House are volunteers from Scandinavia. They live in Ascension House and are glad to share their home with you.What is near Ascension House?Ascension House is only a 15-minute walk from the Sha Tin railway station and bus terminus. You can find everything you need in the nearby shops, or in the busy markets of Mongkok. You can also explore the abundant natural resources of Hong Kong. Needle Hill and the MacLehose Trail are within an easy walk of the Centre, and the beautiful beaches of Sai Kung are only a short bus ride away. Hong Kong is full of interesting temples, pagodas and other religious venues. The Ten Thousand Buddhas Temple and the Che Kung Temple are only two that are very close by. The Ascension House volunteers would love to help you to explore Hong Kong!

It is an ever popular venue for outdoor activities and water sports. Hostellers and friendscan rent bicycles locally and cycle along the magnificent main dam of the reservoir, or along the water's edge to Brides Pool in one direction or along a dedicated cycle track to Tai Po or Shatin in the other. Name: 521. FWD House 1881
Address: 2A Canton Road House 1881 Main Building, Hong Kong China
Description:
Located on the forefront of Hong Kong’s iconic Victoria Harbour and within walking distance of vibrant bustling Tsim Sha Tsui, House 1881 is Hong Kong’s premiere heritage destination. Comprised of five restaurants and bars as well as a stylish boutique hotel, the newly-revitalised property is a secluded sanctuary, exuding tranquillity and a rich sense of history. Housed in an iconic 19th-century building, formerly the Marine Police Headquarters, House 1881 is an historical landmark and a superb example of preserved colonial architecture. The property offers sweeping views of the magnificent Hong Kong skyline and picture-perfect Victoria Harbour. Expertly renovated with attention to detail, the hotel offers two suite categories with each of the impeccably-designed suites featuring both modern comforts and historic elegance. Adorned in elegant period furnishings, each suite is bathed in natural daylight and sheathed in luxurious finishes. With sizeable Art-deco inspired bathrooms and stocked with luxurious amenities, each suite has dream-inducing, luxurious bedding to lull guests to sleep, while sun-dappled interiors nudge them awake.

Description:
As the second hotel of The Hari collection - The Hari Hong Kong is located in Causeway Bay - at the heart of Hong Kong. Owned by The Harilela Group - the brand is built around the heritage of impeccable hospitality bestowed by the Harilela family- who have called Hong Kong their home for generations. A beacon of modern luxury - The Hari collection creates the best guest experience by paying attention to every detail- no matter how small. Open at the end of 2020- The Hari Hong Kong features 210 stylish rooms complete with plush velvet- bespoke wooden flooring and Italian marble bathrooms. The three luxurious suites at the top floor come with separate living rooms- private bars and terraces. Imagined by renowned British interior designer- Tara Bernerd and Partners- the hotel offers elegant rooms with an Italian and a Japanese restaurant- two bars- a large terrace- a 10-person boardroom and a fitness centre. Art runs in the DNA of the hotel- with a range of mediums displayed throughout The Hari. Lucciola serves authentic Italian dishes in a sophisticated setting- defined by a bold palette of amber and green. Zoku- the Japanese restaurant- offers a tasteful tribute to the cuisine. The ceiling of angled timber slats in origami-like forms serve as the focal point of the space. For those who enjoy the morning sun- The Terrace Bar is ideal for a relaxing breakfast or an early informal meeting. Open also for lunch and dinner- The Terrace Bar is an oasis for apres-work drinks overlooking the buzzing city.

Shatin features places of interest such as the 10,000 Buddha Temple, the Hong Kong Heritage Museum and the Jockey Club, a famous world class horse racing arena, Chinese University of Hong Kong and the Science Park. The hotel also features 10 restaurants and bars as well as a wide range of recreational facilities such as the beautiful outdoor swimming pool (closes during winter period), spacious fitness center with sauna, steam, Jacuzzi and beauty services. Newly built and scheduled to open its doors in 2020, the hotel is the most recent addition to the line of established hotels managed by Harbour Plaza Hotels & Resorts. The hotel hosts a picturesque foyer and lobby adorned with the rich hues of gold and black. Diverse rooms and suites are categorized by the playful selection of cards suits, all of which grant stunning views of the harbour or cityscape with complimentary modern amenities. The Hotel Alexandra provides an abundance of facilities including an immaculate outdoor swimming pool, well-equipped fitness centre and delicious international cuisine from our restaurant outlet Café A. Granting guests an opportunity to quench their thirsts, our Bar & Lounge situated on the Lobby floor fashions unique and classic cocktails alongside speciality wines daily. In addition start your day with delectable pastries and freshly brewed coffee at our whimsical Alice’s Corner. Boasting 9,990 sq. ft. of event space with a grandiose ballroom graced with ornate chandeliers and 5 function rooms customizable to every size of meeting, conference or banquet. Name: 58. Little Tai Hang Hotel & Serviced Apartments
Hotel_name: Little Tai Hang Hotel & Serviced Apartments
Address: 98 Tung Lo Wan Road, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong China
Ranking: #13 of 68 apartment hotels in Hong Kong
Description:
Tucked away in a small and quaint corner of Tai Hang is one of Hong Kong’s most enchanting hidden gems - Little Tai Hang. The perfect antidote to bland corporate hotels and soulless shopping-mall environments, our dining and hospitality destination offers an ideal alternative to the hustle of traditional big city living. With sweeping views of Victoria Park, beguiling alfresco eateries, and lovingly curated living spaces, we are breathing new life into the characteristics that make Tai Hang what it is – a fascinating motley of local culture, quaint and charming street life, small and pristine pockets of nature, and a neighbourhood full of enchanted stories. Our service is all about real personality, our eateries are uniquely conceived and our rooms filled with bespoke, characterful and artisanal touches. Skip the touts, traps and big lights, and immerse yourself in the daily street life of Tai Hang. Meander through the lanes where neighbourhood shops and quirky cafes sit side by side, rub shoulders with fascinating local characters, enjoy the nature of nearby parks and discover the inside stories of what makes this community really tick. Stay with us and feel the welcoming vibe of a real home, and experience what the truly local and authentic culture of Hong Kong has to offer.

Name: 802. S-RESIDENCE Serviced Apartments
Address: 5-7 Catchick Street, Kennedy Town, Hong Kong China
Ranking: #56 of 68 apartment hotels in Hong Kong
Description:
S-Residence is an award-winning, pet-friendly serviced apartment catering to the needs of short to medium term stays (30-days minimum) in Hong Kong. Conveniently located just minutes from the hustle and bustle of Central district, S-RESIDENCE offers the comforts of the vibrant, culture-rich neighborhood of Kennedy Town in Western Hong Kong island.Fully-furnished apartments range from 1 to 2 bedroom units, featuring full-size kitchens, wireless internet, cable TV, telephone, and daily maid service (except Sundays and Public Holidays). S-Residence also features an exclusive rooftop BBQ garden with relaxing sea and park views for that much-needed getaway.Retaining the essence of the "tonglau" traditional-style Hong Kong building, while modernizing for today's luxury standards, S-Residence artfully blends the past with the present to create a fresh, contemporary, zen feel. Its ideal location affords both sea and park views while offering the convenience of multiple transportation options.Smart, Simple, and Stylish, S-Residence is the secret to your enjoyable Hong Kong experience!

Description:
Located in Lan Kwai Fong, the hub of Central, Knight on Wyndham offers residents a secure yet fun and artistic residential experience. Guests can expect everything that they would from a quality serviced apartment and more.Each unit is designed with elements of art, history and culture, styling each suite after different characteristics that knights embody, such as “Gallantry” and “Bravery”. The theme is heavily reflected in the decor with bespoke art pieces illustrating historical knights in the style of contemporary artists, including Andy Warhol and Damien Hirst.With just one apartment on each floor, 24-hour security monitoring system, and private lift entrance each with secure key access, guests can rest assured with absolute privacy and peace of mind.

Name: 61. The Fleming, Hong Kong
Address: No.41 Fleming Road, Wan Chai, Hong Kong China
Description:
A stylish, boutique hotel for those in the know who don’t just want to visit Hong Kong, but be plugged in to the life of the city. Each of our rooms has been thoughtfully designed for maximum comfort and charm, in a timeless classic style inspired by Hong Kong’s iconic cross-harbour ferries. Each room category is available with either king size or twin beds and features high quality Sealy Mattresses and luxury bed linens, separate work desks and luxurious bathrooms with our own custom designed amenities. All guests receive complimentary access to state-of-the-art fitness centre Goji Studios, access to the guests’ Welcome Lounge and our unique bespoke Luxe City Guide to the best of Hong Kong. You can also pre-book our direct transfers from the Airport to the Hotel. Using a Mercedes-Benz limousine, staff will meet & greet you at the Arrival Hall and assist you with your luggage, bringing you comfortably and safely to the Hotel.

Name: 62. The Arca
Address: 43 Heung Yip Road, Hong Kong China
Description: Nestled in the heart of the Southern District, Wong Chuk Hang hotel the Arca is a modern contemporary living experience, designed with warmth and comfort in mind. Overlooking the Aberdeen Harbor, the 187 spacious rooms and family rooms with bespoke service, are complemented with a culinary restaurant, fitness center, versatile meetings & event space and a rooftop bar with an infinity pool.

Name: 63. Kew Green Hotel Wanchai Hong Kong
Hotel_name: Kew Green Hotel Wanchai Hong Kong
Address: 41-49 Hennessy Road, Wanchai, Hong Kong China
Description:
An ideal accommodation that is both central and accessible, Kew Green Hotel Wanchai Hong Kong (Formerly Metropark Wanchai) is situated in the heart of Hong Kong's luxury commercial, shopping and entertainment district. In great proximity to the Hong Kong Convention and Exhibition Centre as well as the Mass Transit Railway Station, making it a breeze to get around the city that never sleeps. Each guest room showcases contemporary design with clear ambition for innovations and are equipped with LCD TV, Free Wi-Fi connectivity, electronic safety box, central air-conditioning, spacious working desk and more. Our recent innovative installation is the travel smartphone with unlimited mobile data and hotspot function plus IDD calls to designated countries for free during your stay. Kew Green Hotel Wanchai Hong Kong is a smoke-free property, beckons as a homely and stylish accommodation option so that your experience in Hong Kong will exceed your expectation.

Name: 64. The Langham, Hong Kong
Address: 8 Peking Road, Tsim Sha Tsui, Kowloon, Hong Kong China
Description:
The Langham, Hong Kong is an elegant European-style sanctuary in the heart of Hong Kong's shopping and entertainment district of Tsim Sha Tsui, surrounded by designer boutiques and a mega shopping arcade Harbour City. Perfectly placed within walking distance to iconic attractions including Star Ferry and Victoria Harbour whilst the MTR station lies right at the doorsteps of the hotel and West Kowloon District is just 10-minute away. The hotel boasts 498 spacious rooms and suites with floor-to-ceiling windows, plush furnishings, bespoke minibars, luxurious amenities and personal butler service. Guests can relax at the legendary Langham Club lounge and rooftop Chuan Body + Soul wellness sanctuary with treatment rooms, an outdoor pool and a fitness centre. Also home to an extensive array of high quality restaurants including Three-Michelin-Starred T'ang Court serves authentic Cantonese masterpieces, Bostonian Seafood & Grill for steaks and seafood specialties, Palm Court for English afternoon tea and award-winning Artesian bar in the lobby.

Name: 65. Nina Hotel Island South
Address: No.55 Wong Chuk Hang Road, Hong Kong China
Description:
Located just a 5 minutes’ walk from Wong Chuk Hang station with close proximity to Ocean Park and other great attractions, Nina Hotel Island South is a relaxing urban oasis that introduces you to the quaint Southern District of Hong Kong Island. Surrounded by lush greenery, the Hotel boasts 432 well-appointed rooms and suites for a comfortable and memorable stay. Choose either a stunning hill or city view room and take in the wonderful vistas nearby.
Each guestroom offers refined comfort in a modern design. The welcoming décor and natural wooden flooring match perfectly with the room's thoughtful amenities to provide pleasure and enjoyment. Nestled on the top floor, you can also experience a luxurious escape in the Aqua Suite and Grand Aqua Suite equipped with a private balcony that thrills with stunning panoramic views of Hong Kong's southside.

Name: 66. The Park Lane Hong Kong, a Pullman Hotel
Hotel_name: The Park Lane Hong Kong, a Pullman Hotel
Address: 310 Gloucester Road, Hong Kong China
Description: A contemporary oasis for the 21st-century voyager, The Park Lane Hong Kong, a Pullman Hotel, is a home away from home for global jetsetters and the discerning business traveller. Set in the heart of vibrant Causeway Bay, seconds from the subway station, the hotel is a stone’s throw from the city’s most compelling attractions, from chic designer boutiques and Michelin-starred restaurants to pulsating bars and clubs. Savvy design, intuitive service and jaw-dropping views of the harbour, Victoria Park and the Kowloon skyline combine to make The Park Lane the ultimate sanctuary in Hong Kong for the modern urban nomad.

Name: 67. Nina Hotel Kowloon East
Address: 38 Chong Yip Street, Kwun Tong, Hong Kong China
Description:
Located at the heart of the vibrant business hub of Kwun Tong just a short 5-minute stroll from the Ngau Tau Kok station, Nina Hotel Kowloon East is a design-centric business hotel, providing some of the most spacious standard rooms in Kowloon East. The 254 rooms and suites including 2 unique duplexes and 8 suites, entice all guests with personalised touches of caring service and thoughtful amenities. Connecting rooms are also available for those who desire privacy on family trips.
The Hotel focuses heavily on cutting-edge technology and design innovation for ultimate business travel experience. Unique amenities like our ergonomic Herman Miller Setu chair and extra-long writing desk help take the pressure off your shoulders when you work.

Name: 68. Dorsett Tsuen Wan, Hong Kong
Address: 28 Kin Chuen Street, Kwai Chung, Hong Kong China
Description:
Dorsett Tsuen Wan, Hong Kong is a family-friend hotel and committed to provide it’s guests & associates with a smoke-free environment. Just 8-mins walk to MTR Tai Wo Hau Station or you can venture further with our complimentary shuttle services connecting you to MTR Kwai Fong Station & MTR Tsuen Wan West Station. With FREE WiFi and comprehensive facilities include 24-Hour Self-service laundry & Gym, Outdoor Swimming Pool (closed during Winter) & Conference Equipment; Afterward, relax and dine at our international café with array of delicacies. For families travelling with kids, you must visit our indoor interactive children play area - Kids Zone, located at hotel 3/F, offering 5 themed play areas i.e. “Super Hero”, “Ball Pit Room”, “Fire Station”, “Princess Royal Party” & “Mini Town”, with scheduled kids programs for the whole family to enjoy.

Name: 69. Eaton HK
Address: 380 Nathan Road, Jordan, Kowloon, Hong Kong China
Description:
Located in Jordan along the vibrant Nathan Road, a few minutes’ walk from Jordan MTR Station, Eaton HK features a newly designed lobby and guest rooms, rooftop swimming pool and yoga studio, gym and juice bar, co working club, large event spaces, screening room, art gallery, radio station, and a host of restaurants and bars including a Michelin-starred Cantonese restaurant, an all-day dining floor, an open terrace cocktail bar, and a signature Food Hall. The hotel design references the romantic appeal and spiritual yearning of Wong Kar-wai’s arthouse films of the 1990s. More than a hotel, Eaton HK is an incubator for arts and culture, a beacon for sustainability, a hub for impact initiatives, and a local connection to a global media platform. Eaton HK is the physical arm of Eaton Workshop, a global mission-driven hospitality built to uplift the human spirit as we collectively pursue a better world for people and planet. With distinct parts—Hotel, House, Media, Wellness, and Impact—Eaton is not only a place for travellers to lay their heads, it’s also a place to experience belonging, creativity, and community.

Nestled in the very heart of Kowloon's bustling city centre, the Holiday Inn Golden Mile Hong Kong offers business and leisure travellers a vibrant location, contemporary conveniences, and all the luxuries of home while away.
The hotel provides 622 invitingly comfortable twin, double or king size beds equipped guest rooms and suites, Executive Club floors, award-winning restaurants, bar, function rooms, a landscaped rooftop pool, a state-of-the-art health club and free Wi-Fi. To secure our guests' safety and their property, a key card is required to access the elevator to the guest room floors from 2/F-18/F. We welcome kids with open arms and help families save money with our Kids Stay & Eat Free guarantee. Kids aged 12 and under eat free at breakfast when dining with an adult. Plus to make your stay even more affordable, kids aged 12 and under stay for free when sharing their parents' room.

From fascinating outlets and a well-equipped gymnasium with a sauna and steam room to the rooftop infinity swimming pool, WM Hotel is ready to offer extraordinary experiences for our guests. Whether it's visiting our romantic Chapel, the magnificent WM Grand Ballroom, or eight multi-functional rooms, you will enjoy a delightful experience dedicated to you.

Name: 77. New World Millennium Hong Kong Hotel
Hotel_name: New World Millennium Hong Kong Hotel
Address: 72 Mody Road Kowloon, Hong Kong China
Description:
New World Millennium Hong Kong Hotel is conveniently situated in the vibrant business and shopping district of Tsim Sha Tsui East in Kowloon, on the Victoria Harbour waterfront. The majority of the 464 elegantly appointed guestrooms and suites present spectacular Victoria Harbour views, while exclusive privileges are offered on the Residence Club executive floors and Living Room. The hotel is home to seven dining options, including Chinese restaurant Tao Li; Japanese restaurants Sagano and RANZAN; all-day dining at Café East; French cuisine at La Table; and libations and snacks at Bar on 15 and Lobby Lounge. Meeting and event space includes a pillar-free grand ballroom and 10 meeting rooms of varying sizes. A health club and a rooftop pool are also available. The hotel is just a five-minute walk to the Mass Transit Railway (MTR) East Tsim Sha Tsui Station and Hung Hom Station (interconnecting Hong Kong Island, Kowloon, the New Territories and mainland China), a six-minute drive to the cross-harbour Star Ferry Pier and 45-minute drive to Hong Kong International Airport.

It is home to a fascinating mix of vintage and modern, while featuring an East-meets-West culture in Hong Kong. The Hotel offers convenient proximity to key transport junctions - 10 minutes from Central and 30 minutes from the airport. Guests will enjoy complimentary Hotel Shuttle service to and from the Airport Express. Offering 283 tastefully designed guestrooms and suites, guests may enjoy panoramic views of Victoria Harbour in the harbour-view rooms or gaze at the blissful greenery in the mountain-view rooms. The Hotel is well-equipped with a Club Lounge, Lobby Bar, Rooftop Pool, 24-hour Fitness Centre and the famed Cafe Malacca restaurant. Unlimited, free high-speed WiFi, mobile charging stations are some features adding to Jen’s unique stay experience. **From Friday, 1 November 2019, all Food & Beverage outlets and services at JEN Hong Kong by Shangri-La will no longer participate in the Golden Circle programme. Our hotel swimming pool will be closed for annual maintenance from December 12, 2022 to December 21, 2022 & From December 28, 2022 to February 12, 2023.

Lily Garden Guest House is located in the heart of a well-known tourist area, Nathan Road, Tsim Sha Tsui. It is next to the Tsim Sha Tsui MTR station and Tsim Sha Tsui East Railway Station. Just a street opposite to the brand name shops located in Canton Road. Walking to the Star Ferry pier, Space Museum and other tourist spots only take few minutes.Hong Kong is known as the Pearl of the Orient, the beautiful night scenery is well-known over the world. In here, you can walk to the famous avenue of stars relaxingly in just few minutes or you can take the ferry to enjoy the spectacular view of Hong Kong. At night, you can even see ‘A Symphony of Lights’ to feel the charm of this dynamic metropolis. Lily Garden Guest House is also located in the bustling city where the transportation is very convenient. It is near to the Harbor city, Park Lane, New World Center, THE ONE, K-11 and more shopping centers. Also, there are different kinds of cuisines from all around the world, you can taste as much as you want. Moreover, our guest house also has high accessibility to every single place around Hong Kong by train, MTR, taxi and more. The airport shuttle bus can even bring you from Tsim Sha Tsui to the Hong Kong International Airport or Disneyland. Lily Garden Guest House is your ideal choice for both business and tourist accommodation.

Name: 91. Hong Kong Gold Coast Hotel
Address: 1 Castle Peak Road, Castle Peak Bay, Tuen Mun, Hong Kong China
Description:
Escape the urban landscape of downtown Hong Kong and retreat to a family-friendly beach resort. Only 30 minutes from Central, our hotel is a welcoming seaside oasis with lush tropical gardens that sets the stage for a relaxing holiday, an idyllic wedding or a lively conference. Our 455 rooms and suites, including 11 unique kid-themed-rooms, feature tranquil views of the sea or neighbouring Gold Coast Yacht and Country Club, allowing guests to be comforted by the cool sea breeze as they enjoy the genuine warmth of our service. Five distinguished restaurants, including the Michelin-recommended YUE featuring Cantonese cuisine, satisfy the palate of even the most discerning diners. Our expansive outdoor garden, Chapel, Terrace and Grand Ballroom are ideal venues for wedding of any size. Sharks and Pirates Adventure Zone, free form pools with water slides, water park, sand pit, Outdoor Kids Island, Mini Train Ride, farm and zip lines ensure you and your family stay an enjoyable one.
Read more

Name: 92. Silka Tsuen Wan, Hong Kong
Address: 119 Wo Yi Hop Road, Kwai Chung, Kowloon, Hong Kong 00000 China
Description:
A brand new 4-star hotel opened in 2017, Silka Tsuen Wan, Hong Kong is uniquely located in Tsuen Wan district surrounded by all local flavors. Hotel boasts 409 contemporary design rooms including triple-sharing rooms and suites, family room with 2 double beds and connecting rooms ideally for friends & families. Comprehensive services are offered such as free WiFi, while it takes only 30 minutes' drive to the Hong Kong International Airport, AsiaWorld-Expo and Hong Kong Disneyland. Other facilities include GYM, a multi-function room and all day dining coffee shop. Come and discover a different side of the city with local food, street eateries, wet market and shopping centers nearby, blending the old with new elements that makes your holiday unforgettable.
Read more

Name: 93. the Figo
Address: 77-91 Queen Road's West 4F,Hollywood Centre, Hong Kong China
Description: the Figo proves boutique style and unforgettable hospitality is a universal language. Located in the ever-popular Hong Kong district Sheung Wan, where East & West come together at every corner, the Figo is the destination where travelers and locals alike discover a new boutique hospitality experience, with envelope-pushing design from head to toe. From fully bespoke rooms to the collaborative communal spaces, the Figo is a designer’s hotel, where everyone is welcome to share and show off their own unique style.

Name: 94. The Peninsula Hong Kong
Address: Salisbury Road Kowloon, Hong Kong China
Description:
In December 1928, a legend of Asian hospitality was born – The Peninsula Hong Kong opened its doors. The hotel has an elegant and meticulously crafted design, and is considered a leader of the East defining luxury hospitality. Heralding elements of personalisation, the rooms accent simplicity and elegance with an aesthetic that melds the distinctive design touches and high-tech extras present in today’s luxury excursions. Extensive facilities include a 12,000-square-foot Peninsula Spa, eight award-winning restaurants and bars, a Roman-style swimming pool, and a Shopping Arcade consisting of international and local luxury brands. The Peninsula Hong Kong offers luxury transportation options, from a fleet of fourteen Rolls-Royce limousines to a customized helicopter, providing the ultimate in speed and style for our guests.
Read more

Name: 95. Marco Polo Hongkong Hotel
Address: No.3 Canton Road, Harbour City, Tsim Sha Tsui, Kowloon, Hong Kong China
Description:
Marco Polo Hongkong Hotel has recently completed a comprehensive hotel exterior upgrading programme, all rooms are now available to provide exemplary standard of service and ensuring high level of customer satisfaction. Overlooking the spectacular Victoria Harbour, the Marco Polo Hongkong Hotel is located along Canton Road in Tsim Sha Tsui, at the heart of the city’s busiest commercial, shopping and business hub. The Star Ferry and Hong Kong’s cruise terminal are at your footstep, while shopping is right next door with the hotel forming part of Harbour City – Hong Kong’s largest shopping complex. After an exciting day of sightseeing or business meetings, settle into one of the Marco Polo Hongkong Hotel’s 665 guestrooms and suites while staying connected via the complimentary Wi-Fi internet service.
Read more

Name: 96. Conrad Hong Kong
Address: Pacific Place 88 Queensway, Hong Kong China
Description:
Located in the heart of the city's business district, Conrad Hong Kong offers the luxury base for business and leisure travelers and direct access to major transportation network and entertainment areas. Occupying top 21 floors of the 61-storey building, its 513 guestrooms and suites command panoramic views stretching from The Peak to the Victoria Harbour and beyond. Executive rooms together with an exclusive Executive Lounge offer the ultimate in personalised services to guests who are looking for enhanced privacy and comfort. The self-contained hotel is home to 6 award-winning restaurants and bar, heated outdoor swimming pool, Jacuzzi, 24-hour Health Club, sauna and steam room.

Offering guests a truly culturally rich lodging experience of Hong Kong.

Name: 98. Metropark Hotel Mongkok
Address: No.22 Lai Chi Kok Road, Mong Kok, Kowloon, Hong Kong China
Description:
All guestrooms and exterior of hotel has newly-renovated in 2016 and are equipped with spacious room and WiFi internet access. Metropark Hotel Mongkok is situated in an extremely convenient location providing easy access to the commercial and entertainment area and tourist attractions. There is only within one-minute walking distance to the Prince Edward MTR Station and Cross-Boundary Coach Terminal. Patronage can be traveling to and from the Hong Kong Airport directly by the Airport Bus A21. The Metropark Hotel Mongkok is nearby the Langham Place, MOKO Mall, Ladies Market, Goldfish Market and etc. The compact hotel is ideal for both business and leisure travelers to explore Hong Kong.

Name: 99. The Pottinger Hong Kong
Address: 74 Queen's Road Central (Hotel Main Entrance: 21 Stanley Street), Hong Kong China
Description:
The Pottinger Hong Kong, winner of Asia's Best City Boutique Hotel Award 2014, is conveniently situated on the city's first historic cobbled street in Central, within walking distance of Central MTR Station, Airport Express and Lan Kwai Fong. The central business district location offers direct access to commerce, shopping and dining options. The hotel offers 68 exquisite guestrooms, including 'Pottinger Suite' and 6 cosy suites named after the streets in the neighbourhood. Rooms range from 23 to 68 square metres and provide free WIFI, home entertainment, Nespresso Coffee Machine and more. Guests enjoy East-meets-West hospitality in a vibrant neighbourhood that embraces the sheer charm of old Hong Kong with a modern luxury twist. The Pottinger Hong Kong is where modernity meets heritage. Completing the experience is to pamper yourself with visually-stunning cocktails at The Envoy, up French-Japanese specialties at Ta Vie, artisanal gelato and chocolates at Venchi. (Hotel Main Entrance: 21 Stanley Street, Central)

Name: 103. Dorsett Wanchai
Address: 387-397 Queen's Road East, Hong Kong 32441 China
Description:
The award-winning 4.5-star green hotel Dorsett Wanchai, Hong Kong is located in the thriving business district of Wan Chai, with a mere 8-minutes’ walk from both Wan Chai and Causeway Bay MTR Stations. Most of the hotel’s 454 elegantly designed rooms overlook the iconic Happy Valley Racecourse, and selected room types accommodate up to 4 guests.
Hotel facilities include smart bottle-filling water stations on every guest floor, newly renovated gym room and self-service laundry, 3T Bar and Michelin-starred Chinese restaurant Guo Fu Lou. Enjoy our Foodpanda room service menu available until late hours, and vending machines fully-stocked with refreshments and daily necessities.

Name: 104. Gateway Hotel
Address: No.13 Canton Road, Harbour City, Tsim Sha Tsui, Kowloon, Hong Kong China
Description:
Rising over Hong Kong's commercial and entertainment district of Kowloon is Gateway Hotel, a Marco Polo hotel. Housed in Harbour City – Hong Kong's largest shopping complex – Gateway Hotel, the ultimate in leisure accommodation and shopping experience. In September 2013, Gateway Hotel introduced a brand new 360-degree redesigned property that defined a totally innovative design concept. All 400 guestrooms and suites underwent the redesign, which won a Global Excellence award for Best Hotel by The International Interior Design Association in December 2012. Wi-Fi is complimentary throughout the entire hotel. Complimentary mini-bar service in every room will be replenished daily. The essential refreshments vital to enjoying the dazzling energy of Hong Kong will be restocked daily in the free mini-bar.Enjoy your journey in Hong Kong to the fullest with a handy, a complimentary smartphone for travellers with the power to keep guests totally connected while exploring the city.

Name: 105. The Charterhouse Causeway Bay Hotel
Address: No 209-219 Wanchai Road, Wanchai, Hong Kong China
Description:
The Charterhouse Causeway Bay Hotel Hong Kong is an elegant hotel, conveniently located at the edge of Causeway Bay in Hong Kong Island. The Hong Kong Convention and Exhibition Centre and Causeway Bay MTR subway stations are within easy walking distance of the hotel. The majority of tourist attractions and business areas are easily accessible within 10 minutes drive. Considering the needs of our business visitors, our hotel shuttle will take you to Hong Kong Convention and exhibition Centre during trade fair and event periods in just a few minutes. For our visitors exploring different beauties of Hong Kong, splendid shopping malls like Times Square, Hysan Place and easy transportation system like Causeway Bay subway station are a few steps from our hotel which will never disappoint you. The Gazebo Restaurant, Champs Bar, Harry's Bar and Lounge and Fitness Room 23 hours a day provides you the relaxing places to enjoy your life and escape from the hustle and speed of the city of the day. Free Wifi is available at all guestrooms and public areas are even make your stay more pleasurable. In order to provide a healthy and smoke-free environment for global travelers, The Charterhouse Causeway Bay has been completely a smoke-free hotel to ensure our guests a pleasant stay.
Read more

Name: 106. Y Loft (Youth Square)
Address: 12/F, Youth Square, No.238 Chai Wan Road Chai Wan, Hong Kong 000000 China
Description:
Y Loft houses 148 rooms located in the Main Block and Hostel Block of Youth Square. Room selection includes Twin Rooms, as well as Twin Rooms With Balcony, Triple Rooms, House of Six, Duplex and Accessible Rooms. Equipped with full-service facilities like The Oasis, SkyTrack, common area, fitness centre and laundry marts, etc., Y Loft provides a perfect accommodation for budget travelers all over the world. It also offers concession rate to youth organization or youth activities held by non-profit organization or International Student Identity Card (ISIC) and International Youth Travel Card (IYTC) members. Y Loft has been awarded the Certificate of Excellence for three consecutive years in 2012 – 2014 and 2016 by TripAdvisor in recognition of its well-appointed facilities and the attentive service provided by staff. Y Loft further received a Bravo Badge and Certificate of Recognition from TripAdvisor and an online travel agent respectively, for delivering good levels of guest service and experience this year.

Address: 1 Cheong Lok Street, Jordan, Kowloon Kowloon, Hong Kong China
Description:
Hotel Madera Hong Kong is the place to truly experience the city. Conveniently located in the heart of Jordan, the hotel is close to a host of tourist attractions and offers boundless shopping, dining, and entertainment.
All 88 luxurious hotel rooms have spectacular views of the city and all are lavishly appointed with the finest amenities. Here, your body, mind, and soul are rejuvenated in the caress of nature while you feel a sense of serenity.

Name: 108. The Emperor Hotel
Address: 373 Queen's Road East, Wanchai, Hong Kong China
Description: Dashing yet pleasing, vibrant yet elegant - The Emperor Hotel in Wanchai on Hong Kong Island offers you the urban vibe but still, a truly home away from home with our upscale flair, amenities and services.

Address: No.156-160 Dex Voexu Road West, Hong Kong China
Description: ECO Tree Hotel offers 85 rooms and suites to provide guests with comfortable accommodation around the year at reasonable rates. Enjoy our value-added services. Besides, the city’s historic tram is next to the Eastern Street.

Address: No.72 Gloucester Rd, Wanchai, Hong Kong China
Description: Gloucester Luk Kwok Hong Kong is a super-value hotel located in the heart of Wanchai business district which is within few minutes walk to reach the Hong Kong Convention & Exhibition Centre. With its close proximity to the MTR Wanchai Station, it brings guests every convenience to gain access to all parts of Hong Kong.

Name: 111. Regal Oriental Hotel
Address: No.30-38 Sa Po Road, Kowloon, Hong Kong China
Description: Regal Oriental Hotel will become a smoke-free hotel starting from 1st June 2019. The only international standard hotel in the Kowloon East area, the Regal Oriental Hotel offers great convenience and value-for-money accommodations. International travellers appreciate the hotel's proximity to major shopping complexes, industrial districts, and scenic and heritage spots. Local visitors like the Regal Orienal's location in Kowloon City, well known for its vibrant cultural and historical background. Likewise, the area abounds with restaurants offering fantastic culinary delights for all.

Name: 112. Wharney Hotel
Address: 57-73 Lockhart Road, Hong Kong China
Description:
位於灣仔的準四星級酒店
1987年7月開業至今, 2020年完成全面翻新
粵海華美灣際酒店位於灣仔商業中心地段，由酒店步行前往灣仔港鐵站和香港會議展覽中心只需3分鐘及7分鐘，是商務人仕的最佳選擇。此外，本酒店一直為客人提供溫馨、舒適的住宿體驗。我們以最真誠的服務，為客人提供友善而貼心的服務為榮。我們真誠的期待您的光臨！

Name: 113. Best Western Plus Hotel Hong Kong
Hotel_name: Best Western Plus Hotel Hong Kong
Address: No.308 Des Voeux Road West, Hong Kong 32441 China
Description: BEST WESTERN PLUS Hotel Hong Kong is the first hotel in Hong Kong carrying BEST WESTERN hotel group’s superior brand PLUS. The hotel is well located at the Western District of the Island, a traditional real Hong Kong area with rapid evolution taking place. It is within a 5-minute walk to the nearest Hong Kong University MTR Station.

Name: 114. Lan Kwai Fong Hotel @ Kau U Fong
Hotel_name: Lan Kwai Fong Hotel @ Kau U Fong
Address: No.3 Kau U Fong, Central, Hong Kong China
Description: Awards winning Lan Kwai Fong Hotel @ Kau U Fong is about being stylish, and as comfortable as you want to be, in a location that is perfect for trendy dining, nightlife and entertainment area of Lan Kwai Fong and SoHo, Minutes away from MTR, Macau Ferry Terminal, premier offices and designers shopping. Its rooms are furnished with a distinctive touch of oriental style, overlooking the spectacular view of Hong Kong city, which illuminated at night. Hotel offers free WIFI, happy hour with free house wine.

Name: 115. iclub AMTD Sheung Wan Hotel
Address: 5 Bonham Strand West, Sheung Wan, Hong Kong China
Description: iclub Sheung Wan AMTD Hotel is a contemporary select-service hotel centrally located amidst Hong Kong’s famed Sheung Wan district, a prime centre for business and entertainment, access to Hong Kong-Macau Ferry Terminal in 5 minutes. The hotel offers a completely smoke-free, stylish and comfortable living environment to discerning tech-savvy business & leisure travellers.

Name: 116. E Hotel Hong Kong
Address: 189 Pei Ho Street Sham Shui Po, Hong Kong China
Description:
Located in the historical and authentic district of Sham Shui Po in Kowloon on Pei Ho Street, E Hotel Hong Kong is a finest choice for travellers visiting Hong Kong. We are your home away from home and is steps away from an MTR Station and other public transports, giving easy access to most parts of the Hong Kong. E Hotel offers trendy and warm guestrooms with full facilities including a flat screen TV, air conditioning, in room electric safe, a mini fridge and electric curtain, as well as free wifi. Delivering self-service is the future in the hotel industry, we provide 2 sleek design self-service kiosks at the lobby for our guests to check- in and check-out themselves which save a lot of times for queueing up. Kiosk offers an exciting addition to an array of high-tech services, increasing customer convenience and satisfaction. Hotel lobby decorates with art piece, sculpture, painting which created by well-known artists, offering you an art tour. With fitness room, refreshing rooftop garden and versatile E Lounge, we strive to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible to ensure our guests have a pleasant living experience. 香港E酒店位於九龍深水街歷史悠久的深水區，是前往香港旅遊的最佳選擇。我們是您的家外之家，距離地鐵站和其他公共交通工具僅幾步之遙，方便前往香港的大部分地區。 E 酒店提供時尚而溫馨的客房，配有齊全的設施，包括平面電視，空調，室內電動保險箱，迷你冰箱和電動窗簾以及免費無線網絡連接。提供自助服務是酒店業的未來，我們在大堂提供2個時尚設計的自助服務亭，供客人辦理入住和退房手續，節省了大量的排隊時間。 Kiosk為一系列高科技服務，增加了客戶的便利性和滿意度。酒店大堂裝飾著藝術品，雕塑，由著名藝術家創作的繪畫，為您提供藝術之旅。酒店設有健身室，清新的屋頂花園和多功能的E 酒店休閒空間，讓您盡享輕鬆愉快的住宿體驗，確保客人擁有愉快的生活體驗。

Name: 117. The Otto Hotel
Address: No.8 Cameron Road, Hong Kong China
Description: Whether you’re looking for a well deserved recharge after long days, or keen to explore the neon-lit streets by night, The Otto was created to be your launch pad to the real Hong Kong. Your stay with us provides the ideal place to start and end your journey: soak in Hong Kong’s vibrant undercurrents from our centrally located boutique hotel, mere steps from the shopping, culture and business.

Name: 118. Hotel Pravo
Address: No.10 Peking Road, Tsim Sha Tsui, Kowloon, Hong Kong China
Description:
Hotel Pravo Hong Kong sits in Tsim Sha Tsui, Hong Kong’s well-known commercial, entertainment and shopping district, next to beautiful Victoria Harbour, T Galleria Duty Free and iSquare shopping malls. Surrounded by restaurants serving different cuisine, and a few steps away from the Tsim Sha Tsui MTR station and the ferry terminal, the hotel provides easy access for business travellers. The hotel offers 92 deluxe rooms and suites, each decked out to meet guests’ varied needs with decor modelled after themes like rock-and-roll black, mysterious purple, pastels and classy gold. Besides a spacious living area and well-equipped bathrooms, the property also comes with fitness facilities, high-speed WiFi and 24-hour security. Hotel Pravo Hong Kong provides you with the convenience, comfort and peace of mind, whether you are on leisure or business travel.

Name: 119. Best Western Plus Hotel Kowloon
Address: 73 - 75 Chatham Road South, Tsimshatsui, Kowloon, Hong Kong China
Description:
Best Western Plus Hotel Kowloon in Tsimshatsui, Hong Kong is located in town’s most popular dining, shopping and entertainment district, Tsimshatsui in Kowloon. Best Western Hotels & Resorts has more than 4,000 hotels in 100 countries and has been renowned the world’s largest hotel chain. Its Best Western Plus was ranked Number One Upper Midscale Hotel, 2014 Business Travel News Chain Survey. It is an easy walking distance to Nathan Road and popular shopping malls in Tsimshatsui such as Harbour City, Ocean Terminal, China Hong Kong City, Ocean Centre, The One, i-Square, Miramar Shopping Centre, K11, Duty Free Shop (DFS) to name a few. There are hundreds of restaurant and bars around BEST WESTERN PLUS Hotel Kowloon, Tsimshatsui, Hongkong. The city’s trendiest places for drinks include Knutsford Terrace, Mody Road, and Tsimshatsui East in Kowloon. Within 15 minutes’ walk from Best Western Plus Hotel Kowloon, Tsimshatsui, Hong Kong, visitors can explore Kowloon’s hottest attractions

Name: 121. Mandarin Oriental, Hong Kong
Address: 5 Connaught Road Central, Hong Kong China
Description: In the middle of the Central district, Mandarin Oriental, Hong Kong is ideally located for all major attractions. With a refined design reflecting our Oriental heritage, our rooms and suites are some of the most spacious in the city. Our nine restaurants and bars offer a range of cuisine and dining experiences. Escape the stresses of the city with our luxurious spa and leisure facilities. We can easily cater for all manner of meetings and events with our excellent staff and outstanding facilities. Whether you'd like to swim, work out or just relax, we can help you make the most of your leisure time.
Language: English, French, Chinese, Japanese and 1 more

Name: 122. Two MacDonnell Road
Address: 2 Macdonnell Road Mid-Levels, Hong Kong China
Description: Located in the idyllic Central Mid-Levels, just a stone's throw away from the CBD, Two MacDonnell Road offer an oasis of relaxation and enjoyment for travellers in busy Hong Kong. Each of our accommodations comes with full amenities, including complimentary Wi-Fi and kitchenette, as well as attentive guest services such as housekeeping, 24-hour reception and security, babysitting, self-service launderette, and complimentary shuttle bus service to Central. Guests can re-energise themselves with our 24-hour gym, visit the nearby Botanical Gardens or Hong Kong Park, or enjoy delicious cuisine and cocktails at café bar on 8.

Name: 123. Hong Kong Ocean Park Marriott Hotel
Hotel_name: Hong Kong Ocean Park Marriott Hotel
Address: 180 Wong Chuk Hang Road, Aberdeen, Hong Kong China
Description:
Hong Kong Ocean Park Marriott Hotel is conveniently located on the southern side of Hong Kong Island, offering swift accessibility to Admiralty station with a mere 6-minute MTR ride, and just two stops away from the Exhibition Centre MTR station. The hotel comprises 469 guestrooms and suites in nature-inspired décor, with attentive services and various facilities, offering the finest hospitality to discerning travelers.
Feel inspired when you walk into our hotel lobby and see our 50-foot-tall aquarium of island flora and fauna. Enjoy one of our many restaurants, bistros, lounges or bars. Together with our 24-hour in-room dining, you have all-day access to delicious food. Lounge by our lagoon-style pool, relax at our tranquil spa and feel refreshed for events in our pillarless ballroom, one of the largest on Hong Kong Island. Chic designs and catering make us the right destination for teambuilding exercises, breakouts and much more. Our hotel rooms feature three separate themes while our luxe suites offer access to M Club Lounge. Upgrade your travel at Hong Kong Ocean Park Marriott Hotel.
Read more

Name: 124. Four Points by Sheraton Hong Kong Tung Chung
Hotel_name: Four Points by Sheraton Hong Kong Tung Chung
Address: 9 Yi Tung Road Lantau Island, Hong Kong China
Description:
Four Points by Sheraton Hong Kong Tung Chung delivers a restful stay for savvy business and leisure travelers on their next adventures. Fun-loving types can relax over Hong Kong’s contribution to the global signature Best Brews craft beer program and enjoy two timeless dining choices. Select authentic local flavors in the Tung Chung Kitchen or lighter fare in the Harbour Lounge with its “grab and go” bakery. Located in the heart of a new waterfront commercial and residential hub, the stylish seafront hotel is minutes away from Lantau Island’s famed hiking trails and local attractions such as the Citygate Outlets and the Ngong Ping 360 Cable Car. The hotel also enjoys easy access to AsiaWorld Expo, Hong Kong international airport, Hong Kong Macau-Zhuhai Bridge, and Shenzhen Bay. After a full day of fun and adventure, recharge in a stylish guest room and prepare for another fun day. Organizers can contact our meeting planners to create a memorable event in one of our event spaces.
Read more

Name: 125. The Upper House
Address: Pacific Place, 88 Queensway, Hong Kong China
Description: The Upper House is a highly individualized small luxury hotel designed by Hong Kong architect Andre Fu. The hotel’s 117 rooms (including 21 suites and 2 penthouses) start at 730sq ft – the largest in Hong Kong. They feature wonderfully spacious bathrooms and dressing areas, and offer either scenic harbour or island views. Calming and contemporary, the rooms are designed to provide a sense of relaxation, warmth and understated luxury.

Name: 126. Novotel Citygate Hong Kong
Address: No.51 Man Tung Road, Tung Chung, Hong Kong China
Description:
The only airport hotel in Hong Kong with city convenience, Novotel Hong Kong Citygate is just 5 minutes from Hong Kong International Airport and AsiaWorld-Expo. With direct access to MTR, it takes only 30 minutes to the city centre and Hong Kong Disneyland is 2 stops away. Enjoy spectacular views from the Ngong Ping Cable Car and discover bargain shopping at Citygate Outlets, both are at the doorstep. Features meeting facilities, two restaurants, a bar, a 24-hour gym and swimming pool. *In view of the recent announcement made by Hong Kong SAR Government in regards of the closures of leisure venues & facilities: we regret to inform you our swimming pool & In Balance fitness centre will be temporarily closed until further notice.
Read more

Name: 127. The Murray, Hong Kong, a Niccolo Hotel
Hotel_name: The Murray, Hong Kong, a Niccolo Hotel
Address: No.22 Cotton Tree Drive Central, Hong Kong China
Description:
Located along legendary Cotton Tree Drive in the heart of Hong Kong, The Murray is a luxury iconic landmark hotel. This contemporary urban sanctuary features 336 sophisticated spacious suites and guest rooms across 25-storey and five elegant dining destinations including a glamorous rooftop restaurant and bar with panoramic views. The hotel’s terraces around the arches, an architectural signature of the building also showcase views of the city, Hong Kong Park and Hong Kong Zoological and Botanical Gardens. The Murray, Hong Kong was built in 1969, winning multiple awards for ground-breaking and energy efficient design. Sir Norman Foster and his team at Foster+Partners have accepted the challenge to re-design the architectural and interior finishes and is now bringing this magnificent building to life as a celebration of the past and future.

Language: English, French, Chinese, Filipino and 2 more

Name: 128. Hyatt Regency Hong Kong, Sha Tin
Hotel_name: Hyatt Regency Hong Kong, Sha Tin
Address: No.18 Chak Cheung Street, Sha Tin, New Territories, Hong Kong China
Description: As the latest urban oasis in Hong Kong, Hyatt Regency Hong Kong, Sha Tin features 430 guestrooms and 132 well-furnished suites specially designed for long stay accommodation. Exciting dining options include Sha tin 18 Chinese restaurant, all-day-dining Cafe, Pool Bar, Tin Tin Bar and Patisserie. Recreational facilities include the luxurious Melo Spa, outdoor heated swimming pool and whirlpool, fitness centre with sauna and steam, tennis court, bike rental and Camp Hyatt for children.

Name: 129. Grand Hyatt Hong Kong
Address: No.1 Harbour Road Wan Chai, Hong Kong China
Description:
Grand Hyatt Hong Kong is located along the waterfront of Hong Kong Island commanding views of the harbour. The hotel is directly connected to the Hong Kong Convention & Exhibition Centre. The hotel is only 5 minutes by car from Central and Causeway Bay; and 40 minutes from Hong Kong International Airport. Grand Hyatt Hong Kong features 542 luxurious rooms and suites, nine acclaimed restaurants and bars offering a fabulous range of cuisines including Chinese, Italian, Japanese and international fare, in the heart of the Wanchai district. Located on the 11th floor of the Grand Hyatt, the Plateau Spa offers privacy, seclusion and an escape from the vibrant city of Hong Kong. Grand Hyatt Hong Kong boasts extensive entertainment facilities such as a 50-metre outdoor heated pool and a 24-hour fitness studios and a 400-metre jogging path. Please be informed of the waterfront promenade project that is currently undertaking outside the hotel. The project is at times visible from and audible at the hotel.
Read more

Name: 130. Hong Kong SkyCity Marriott Hotel
Address: No.1 Sky City Road East, Hong Kong International Airport Lantau, Hong Kong China
Description: Rest easy at Hong Kong SkyCity Marriott Hotel. Our hotel in Hong Kong, Hong Kong, is located on the shores of the South China Sea on peaceful Lantau Island, only five minutes from Hong Kong International Airport and directly connected to AsiaWorld-Expo. After a busy day, unwind in one of our newly reimagined, spacious guest rooms and suites featuring premium amenities like plush bedding, a large flat-screen TV, a stately marble bathroom, complimentary Wi-Fi, and an ergonomic, well-lit workspace.

Name: 131. InterContinental Grand Stanford Hong Kong, an IHG Hotel
Hotel_name: InterContinental Grand Stanford Hong Kong, an IHG Hotel
Address: No. 70 Mody Road Tsimshatsui East, Kowloon, Hong Kong China
Description: Nestled in the heart of the bustling shopping, business and entertainment district of Tsim Sha Tsui East, the award-winning InterContinental Grand Stanford Hong Kong offers sophistication and heritage amidst the breath-taking view of Victoria Harbour. More than 500 luxuriously appointed guest rooms and suites, the excellent meeting and event facilities in a comfortable setting as well as a host of world-class restaurants make it the perfect choice for business and leisure travelers alike.

Name: 132. Largos Hotel
Address: 30 Nanking Street Jordan, Kowloon, Hong Kong China
Description:
"A perfect location for adventurous tourists interested in exploring the authentic side of Hong Kong." At the heart of Jordan, Largos Hotel has recently been refurbished into retro Hong Kong 50s and 60s style, offering panoramic and peaceful greenery views overlooking the Kowloon Cricket Club and Kings Park. Yet, with the well-connected MTR and bus networks on it's doorstep, most of Hong Kong's sightseeing spots, commercial and shopping districts are within easy reach; not to mention the Hotel itself is nestled amongst an abundance of restaurants and boutiques. Largos Hotel enjoys a great share of regular return customers through its central location. The refined elegance and comfort, together with the exceptional levels of personalized service, greets guests in each of the 100 guest rooms and suites at an affordable and competitive price. If you want to experience the best of cosmopolitan Hong Kong while enjoying the comfort and surrounds, the Largos Hotel is definitely your choice.
