Name: 133. Wanchai 88 Hotel
Address: 139 Thomson Road, Hong Kong China
Description: Located in downtown HK and just a stone's throw from the Hong Kong Convention and Exhibition Centre and tourist attractions, Wanchai 88 showcases a trendy setting and a comfortable atmosphere with thoughtfully designed lighting. Featuring spacious rooms with handy services and facilities, we offer you a pleasant stay in this metropolis where Eastern traditions blend perfectly with Western cultures

Name: 134. Silka Far East Hotel
Address: No.135-143 Castle Peak Road, Tsuen Wan, Kowloon, Hong Kong China
Description: Silka Far East, Hong Kong is a value hotel located in Tsuen Wan, a bustling bay in Hong Kong. The hotel has 240 rooms offering a fuss-free, comfortable and safe stay at affordable prices. The hotel is within walking distance from the Tsuen Wan MTR, City Landmark and other shopping malls, commercial and recreation areas in the district. Complimentary in-town shuttle bus service is available for your convenience.

Name: 135. AKVO Hotel
Address: 57 Jervois Street, Sheung Wan, Hong Kong China
Description: Blending East and West, AKVO Hotel mixes elements from traditional Chinese paintings with modern Western fittings to create the perfect balance between both worlds. A stone’s throw away from Central, AKVO Hotel offers you quiet accommodation paired with the convenience of being 5-minutes walking distance from Hong Kong’s primary commercial hub. So come visit AKVO today!

Name: 136. Silka Seaview Hotel
Address: No.268 Shanghai Street, Yaumatei, Kowloon Yau Ma Tei, Hong Kong China
Description: Silka Seaview, Hong Kong is situated in Yau Ma Tei, one of the most vibrant districts of Hong Kong. The hotel has 268 well-designed guest rooms to provide all the comforts of home. Just a footstep away from Yau Ma Tei MTR Station and right next to the Temple Street Market and Jade Market, the hotel's prime location provides unrivaled access to the busy commercial and entertainment life of the city. Complimentary in-town shuttle bus service is available, and the hotel offers the best value for money and a perfect accommodation for travellers on a budget.

Name: 137. Hotel Ease Access • Tsuen Wan
Address: 12 Ka Hing Road, Hong Kong China
Description: Hotel Ease Access‧Tsuen Wan is easy to get to, and easy to enjoy. And getting to all the fun places you want to go to in Hong Kong is easy from where we are too. The decoration throughout is fresh, green and environmentally friendly so you feel relaxed and happy wherever you go. Once you arrive, you’ll find all our 170 rooms are decorated in cool, chic colours and ideally designed for business or leisure. Some rooms have two double beds which are perfect for families and friends, so everything really is easy!

Name: 138. Bridal Tea House Hotel Yau Ma Tei
Hotel_name: Bridal Tea House Hotel Yau Ma Tei
Address: 6 Arthur Street, Yau Ma Tei, Hong Kong China
Description:
Bridal Tea House Hotel (Yau Ma Tei) located at the commercial, shopping and leisure spot of Yau Tsim Mong distrist, only 3 minutes walk to the nearest MTR Yau Ma Tei station. The famous Temple Street night market, Tin Hau Temple and shopping malls can be reached in 5 minutes. We proudly offer convenience, relaxed and contented shopping moments for our guests. All 127 elegant rooms are well-equipped with Free Wi-Fi service, independent air conditioning system and LCD TV. Stylish and unique Bridal Tea House Restaurant with healthy western dishes menu provide a relax environment after a long day for business clients and tourists. Multi-functional VIP rooms are also available for business conference and wedding services.

Address: 29A, Granville Road, Tsim Sha Tsui, Kowloon, Hong Kong China
Description: Located in the middle of Tsim Sha Tsui, Soravit On Granville is scheduled to open in January 2018. This second hotel by Soravit Hotels Group provides guests with a boutique space filled with authentic Thai interior designs and artwork by traditional artists from Bangkok. With the first ever Thai-themed hotel in Hong Kong, we aim to demonstrate yet again our attention to fine details and focus on

Name: 140. Holiday Inn Express Causeway Bay Hong Kong, an IHG Hotel
Hotel_name: Holiday Inn Express Causeway Bay Hong Kong, an IHG Hotel
Address: No.33 Sharp Street East Causeway Bay, Hong Kong China
Description:
Enjoy the Sights and Sounds of Causeway Bay's Exotic Commercial Centre at the Holiday Inn Express Hong Kong Causeway Bay.
With a host of corporate headquarters in the nearby Times Square, Lee Garden and Hysan Place, the Causeway Bay MTR station is within walking distance from hotel. Renowned tourist attractions and landmarks are nearby such as the Sogo Departments Store, Hong Kong Stadium, Victoria Park and Happy Valley Racecourse. For families, the distance from hotel to Ocean Park is only 4.9 km and Hong Kong Disneyland is 26.5km.

Name: 141. The Mercer Hong Kong
Address: No.29 Jervois Street, Sheung Wan, Hong Kong China
Ranking: #4 of 68 apartment hotels in Hong Kong
Description: The Mercer Central is conveniently located within a transport hub that connects the Hong Kong-Macau Ferry Terminal, Airport Express Hong Kong Station and Sheung Wan MTR Station, providing you with the perfect starting point for a visit to any nature. Located in Sheung Wan, experience a touch of East and West in the neighbourhood’s labyrinth of food and retail shops, both traditional and new. A short stroll away is the financial district of Central, connecting you to prime CBD offices such as The Center, IFC and Exchange Square. When the sun sets, head over to Lan Kwai Fong and SOHO just steps away to experience Hong Kong nightlife.

Name: 142. Hotel COZi Oasis
Address: No.443 Castle Peak Road, Kwai Chung, Hong Kong 852 China
Description:
Set amidst Hong Kong’s bustling urban landscape in Kwai Tsing district, Hotel COZi‧Oasis offers chic guestrooms and suites with free WiFi. Added to the convenience, the property provides free shuttle bus service to Kwai Fong, Lai Chi Kok and Tsim Sha Tsui. Hotel COZi‧Oasis is around a 7-minute walk from MTR Kwai Hing Station, while Hong Kong International Airport, Hong Kong Disneyland and Asia World Expo are around a 30-minute drive away. The hotel’s comprehensive facilities allow guests to keep up the exercise routine at the fully-equipped gym, get a time-out at the delightful Grazzi Garden or experience a rejuvenating journey at Spa. International cuisine and buffet are offered at the all-day dining restaurant. COZi Lounge is a restaurant and bar coming with an Art Deco interior design.
Read more

Name: 143. Eco Tree Hotel Causeway Bay
Address: 15 Mercury Street, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong China
Description: The conveniently located 99-room boutique hotel is located in the heart of Causeway Bay, Hong Kong. The hotel offers both the harbour view and the city view of its vibrant neighborhood. A short walk to the Tin Hau or Fortress Hill MTR Station brings you to Hong’s Kong’s commercial hub and allows easy access to the very best shopping and entertainment areas in the city that never sleeps.

Name: 144. Hotel Hart
Address: No.4 Hart Avenue, Tsim Sha Tsui, Kowloon Tsim Sha Tsui, Hong Kong China
Description:
In the heart of Tsim Sha Tsui, Hotel Hart offers stylish yet affordable accommodation, redefining the image of a modern hotel. Comfort and style go hand in hand and the cold, grey aesthetic in the public places contrasts with the warmer, oaken bedroom flooring and soft, interior fittings that make a distinction wonderfully with glass-walled standing showers, and the outlined walls and furniture of rusty iron tones combine for an unforgettable stay. Raw, concrete and white brick-work are of a purity to enchant and created through industrial chic and a casual, elegant décor. Out of the windows there are stunning views over the streets of the city. The hotel is of a contemporary design but uniquely fresh and sophisticated and will be appreciated by visitors who are either young travellers or groovy baby-boomers. The fine Hotel Hart is hospitable and tasteful yet with a personal feeling, heady atmosphere and embracing flair.
Read more

Name: 145. The Nap Tsim Sha Tsui - Capsule Hotel
Hotel_name: The Nap Tsim Sha Tsui - Capsule Hotel
Address: No.42 Mody Road, Tsim Sha Tsui Unit B, 4/F, Lyton Building, Hong Kong China
Ranking: #6 of 8 capsule hotels in Hong Kong

Name: 146. Travelodge Kowloon
Address: No.23 Saigon Street, Jordan, Kowloon, Hong Kong China
Description:
Located in a quiet pocket of peace just steps away from the pulsating energy of Nathan Road in Jordan, Travelodge Kowloon provides the perfect pathway to, as well as an ideal respite from the colourful excitement of Kowloon. The Hotel has 126 contemporary rooms, each designed for your comfort with a practical layout and plenty of space and natural light. Step outside the Hotel and it’s just a 2 minute walk to Jordan MTR Station, making it super easy to connect to all MTR stops throughout the city. Within minutes you can explore the abundance of shops in Tsim Sha Tsui and the famous street markets in Yau Ma Tei and Mong Kok. From Travelodge Kowloon, you can easily experience all the colours, sights and sounds of Kowloon and Hong Kong Island. And no matter how late you return, your Security Card allows you safe and easy late night access to and from the Hotel. We welcome you to our peaceful little oasis and wish you an unforgettable stay in our vibrant city.

Name: 147. Hotel 1936
Address: 179 Prince Edward Road West Kowloon, Hong Kong China
Description: A heritage hotel revitalized from a Grade III heritage building built in 1936. Situation in the heart of Kowloon, Hotel 1936 is only 3 minute walk from the Prince Edward MTR station and surrounded by convenient transportation network.

Name: 148. Hongkong MK Hotel
Address: No.11 Changsha Street, Mongkok, Hong Kong China
Description:
Looking for a place to stay in Hong Kong? Then look no further than Hongkong MK Hotel, a budget friendly hotel that brings the best of Hong Kong to your doorstep.
Hongkong MK Hotel offers guests an array of room amenities including a flat screen TV and air conditioning, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available.
The hotel offers a 24 hour front desk, 24 hour check-in, and a concierge, to make your visit even more pleasant.
While staying at Hongkong MK Hotel, visitors can check out The Lounge & Bar at The Ritz-Carlton, Hong Kong (1.0 mi) and Tsim Sha Tsui Promenade (1.5 mi), some of Hong Kong's top attractions.

Name: 151. The Ritz-Carlton, Hong Kong
Address: No.1 Austin Road West International Commerce Center, Kowloon, Hong Kong China
Description:
Occupying floors 102 to 118 of the International Commerce Centre in Kowloon, The Ritz-Carlton, Hong Kong, is the highest hotel in the world. The 5-star Hong Kong hotel's 312 guestrooms offer spectacular city and harbor views. The hotel offers guests an epicurean journey in the sky with its six distinctive dining venues, including state-of-the-art Michelin-starred Italian restaurant Tosca di Angelo and Michelin two-starred Chinese restaurant Tin Lung Heen as rooftop bar Ozone at 490 meters above sea level. For those wishing to relax and indulge, The Ritz-Carlton Spa Hong Kong, located on the 116th floor, features nine deluxe treatment rooms and two couple's suites, redefining the urban spa experience in the city and across Asia. The hotel features a fully equipped fitness center, outdoor Jacuzzi, and an indoor pool on the 118th floor with a 28m x 7m LED screen on the ceiling, as well as one of the largest ballrooms in the city at 870sqm. Complemented by an additional four meeting rooms, the ballroom has become the major social venue for Hong Kong and has set the benchmark for events in the region.

Name: 152. 99 Bonham All Suite Hotel
Address: 99 Bonham Strand Sheung Wan, Hong Kong 999077 China
Ranking: #1 of 68 apartment hotels in Hong Kong
Description:
99 Bonham A sophisticated luxury boutique hotel, 99 Bonham is located in Hong Kong's historically and culturally significant Sheung Wan district. Each floor in the modern glass tower features three beautifully appointed guest suites with magnificent city views. Architecture and interiors are designed by the internationally renowned Antonio Citterio Patricia Viel and Partners. This exceptional hotel is a superb choice for business and leisure travelers who appreciate designer chic and a personalised insider experience of the city. NEIGHBOURHOOD At 99 Bonham you're in the heart of one of Hong Kong's most fascinating districts with convenient access to the city's most compelling attractions. The neighbourhood's winding streets feature a lively mix of traditional architecture, charming antique shops, contemporary art galleries, and chic restaurants.

Name: 153. Sheraton Hong Kong Tung Chung Hotel
Hotel_name: Sheraton Hong Kong Tung Chung Hotel
Address: 9 Yi Tung Road Tung Chung, Lantau Island, Hong Kong China
Description:
Discover a greener side to Hong Kong on Lantau Island from Sheraton Hong Kong Tung Chung for your next business or leisure escape. The award winning Spa adjacent to the rooftop infinity pool is an urban oasis for those looking for a space to relax any time of the day from the bustle of the city. *Hotel Renovation Project - Four Seasons Hotel Hong Kong is undertaking an enhancement program including guest rooms and certain lobby features. To ensure minimal disruption to our guests, these enhancements will be carried out in phases with appropriate isolation occurring. New buffer floors are arranged to mitigate transfer of any sound in guest rooms, and work will be scheduled at non-intrusive times. Description:
The T HOTEL is a training concept hotel committed to providing vocational training in the field of hospitality and tourism, while dedicated to delivering a pleasant hospitality experience to our guests.Set among the lush greenery surrounding of Pokfulam, 20 minutes southwest of Hong Kong's city centre with panoramic views of the South China Sea, this 30-room training hotel is situated on the 6th floor of the VTC Pokfulam Complex as part of the Hotel and Tourism Institute, "HTI". Since first introduced our hospitality programmes in 1984, HTI has been the forerunner in the field of hospitality training in Hong Kong. Together with our training spa and training restaurants, The T Hotel forms a vital element of the HTI's ongoing initiative to provide integral vocational training beyond the classroom environment. The T Hotel is operated by trainees under the supervision of experienced professionals from various fields of the hospitality industry.As our trainees deliver this unique brand of hospitality while in return receive world-class vocational training, we look forward to welcoming you to The T Hotel.

Thoughtfully designed, 5-star accommodations featuring 127 hotel rooms and luxury suites are complemented by East-meets-West elements that provide the perfect setting to offer personalized St. Regis Butler Service. The hotel features two Michelin-starred L’Envol French restaurants helmed by Chef Olivier Elzer and one Michelin-starred Rùn Chinese restaurant led by Chef Hung Chi-Kwong. At the same time, The Drawing Room hosts a redefined Afternoon Tea experience and offers all-day international dining. The St. Regis Bar signature cocktails are inspired by the tales of two cities - Hong Kong and New York.

Address: 1F, No.10-16 Pak Tai Street, To Kwa Wan, Hong Kong 0000 China
Description:
The Mahjong is Hong Kong's hippest hostel, centrally located in an authentic Hongkie neighbourhood, superbly connected by over 30 bus routes to the city's hustling bustling attractions, and just a stone's throw from its renowned mountain & coastal charms. All buses stop right outside The Mahjong - we are just 10-15 mins from Tsim Sha Tsui & Mong Kok, and only 25-30 mins from Causeway Bay & Central. The Mahjong neighbourhood is a foodie's paradise and still a best kept secret amongst locals. So come stay with us, and experience Hong Kong as the locals do!
The first and only hostel in Hong Kong to have a large social lounge and custom built bunk beds/pods that maximize privacy with personal light & electric sockets, keycard security locker, and privacy screen. Thick 6" hotel grade mattresses and fluffy pillows guarantee you a good night's rest. Designer touches around the hostel showcase Hong Kong heritage and culture.

Name: 256. Ovolo Central
Address: 2 Arbuthnot Road, Hong Kong China
Description:
What’s better than being in the centre of it all? Ovolo Central provides an unmatched location in one of the world’s greatest cities. Situated on Arbuthnot Road, the hotel sits at the crossroads of Hong Kong’s famed nightlife and dining districts – Lan Kwai Fong & SOHO. Its 42 guest rooms not only are spacious at 33 square metres each, but are also designed for guests to enjoy full relaxation from check-in to check-out. In addition to a multitude of dining and drinking venues, Hong Kong’s central district is home to some of the city’s best shopping – from the IFC mall, to Marks & Spencer, Zara and Topshop. And when hustle of bustle of CBD gets too much? A 5-minute walk from Ovolo Central will lead you to the city’s famed MTR transit system. while a 15-minute walk from the hotel lands you at Central Pier, the perfect spot to satisfy your wanderlust with a number of ferries to Hong Kong’s outlying islands. Ovolo Central offers the uniquely bespoke service expected from a boutique hotel, with the unmatched collection of amenities only found at Ovolo.
Read more

Name: 257. AKI Hong Kong - MGallery
Address: 239 Jaffe Road, Wan Chai, Hong Kong China
Description:
AKI Hong Kong – M Gallery is an elegant and stylish new gem, hidden in the heart of the vibrant and historic Wanchai district. It is just an 8-minute walk from the Hong Kong Convention and Exhibition Centre and a 3-minute walk to the Exhibition Centre MTR station. AKI Hong Kong’s 173 contemporary guest rooms are thoughtfully designed in light natural wood tones boast high ceilings and windows with abundant natural daylight sweeping in. It also features the first Japanese-style tatami rooms in Hong Kong. Indulge in the taste sensations of TANGRAM, our vibrant tapas restaurant and sake bar. Or unwind at the stunning 25th floor whisky bar Uncle Ming’s, where you can savour a fine selection of 80 malts and signature cocktails, with dramatic city views. The co-work style Lobby Lounge provides a natural social hub to hang out, catch up on your emails or enjoy a casual, healthy snacks with freshly made detox juices and wines. Workout in style at the hotel’s top floor gymnasium, which features sweeping panoramic views of the city including partial views of the sea and Hong Kong’s magnificent harbour.
